channel.title: Need help with custom map
channel.description:
Hello. I have made a custom map, and need some help with the green corners/edges. Earlier, I accidentally editted one by mistake. How can I change the color of the green edges to a different color? I tried picking the color/tile I wanted then clicking on the green part. It didn't work. Any help?
[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2vjsqyc.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need help with custom map
